solution_line_template: Hansel makes ${base_salary} and received a {hansel_raise_percent} raise so his raise is {base_salary}*{hansel_raise_percent} = $3,000.00
Gretel makes ${base_salary} and received a {gretel_raise_percent} raise so her raise is {base_salary}*{gretel_raise_percent} = $4,500.00

If Gretel makes ${gretel_new_salary} a year and Hansel makes ${hansel_new_salary} then Gretel makes {gretel_new_salary}-{hansel_new_salary} = $<<{gretel_new_salary}-{hansel_new_salary}={difference}>>{difference} more a year than Hansel
